attributes.action: immediately put in place legislation to ensure that when  Lord Carter's Digital Britain Report is put in place, the BBC Licence Tax will be scrapped.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the move to video and television being provided on Broadband the BBC digital output will be defunct therefore the BBC Licence Tax MUST be scrapped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
